content: The Skandha of Choice can be found in the Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow by the Purifying Spring Shrine. From the Shrine, head forwards and into the large body of water nearby. To your left you can find the Buddha statue head and the item.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Choice.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Choice'.
The content is as follows:
The Skandha of Choice can be found in the Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow by the Purifying Spring Shrine. From the Shrine, head forwards and into the large body of water nearby. To your left you can find the Buddha statue head and the item.
